Title: Hold high the red banner of great Mao Zedong Thought to wage the great proletarian cultural revolution to the end
Designer: Shanghai People's Fine Arts Publishing House Propaganda Poster Group (上海人民美术出版社宣传画组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: This is a print from the 8th edition (July 1967).The paraders hold copies of the Selected Works of Mao Zedong (Mao Zedong xuanji - 毛泽东选集).
